startDate.description: Returns records on or after this date

endDate.description: Returns records on or before this date

pageSize.description: The number of items to be included in each page of the result set

pageNumber.description: The page number of the result set to return

sortDirection.description: The direction in which results should be sorted

sortField.description: The field on which results should be sorted. This can be any field in the response object

name.description: Used to query charges by various criteria including amount, date, order number, type, etc. Results include both summarized information and itemized detail

accountNumber.description: The last 4 digits of the customer's credit card number

source.description: The type of application from which the transaction originated

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the transaction
